name: This Website!
description:
Built this interactive REACT website from the ground up to highlight and house my skills and qualifications. 

Tools include: React.js, JS, Styled-Components, Express, PostgresSQL, Framer-Motion

name: Full-Stack E-commerce Store
description:
- Developed a full stack "CRUD" web-store front utilizing a variety of technologies and databases 

 - Customer information was stored using a database developed in MongoDB 

 - Cart is designed in Redux 

- React.js, JS, CSS, HTML, Node.JS, Express,
bulletPoints: - Customer information is stored in MongoDB
